Daemos had just sat at the conference table which Zardus had invited him to.

Daemos:
I must inform you first that I will take part to the IGL championship that 
will soon be held. Should I win, the protoforms will be Tripredacus property 
and will not belong to my employer, which will most likely be you at that 
time. As for my capacities, I am a murderer, an assassin, a terrorist, a 
soldier, a warrior, an extremist, a shock trooper, I am anything you would 
ask of me. However, I suggest you to give me specific orders, because any 
details that you will not have covered will be left to my discretion. This 
will ensure you that no... how could I say... frustrating events will 
interfere with your plans. As for my reward, we will see to it later.
